content: 2 k row 4 sl 1 k8 ssk k1 turn work these 2 rounds until 28 32 36 sts remain continue working one more stitch until all the stitches then work decrease round only until 16 20 20 sts have been worked do not turn work begin gusset remain use kitchener stitch to close toe cut yarn a leaving end long enough to weave in mark center of heel turn for beginning of round two color toe optional using 2 5 mm needles & yarn a work toe as above gusset using yarn b pick up and knit 1 st in each until 7 rounds remain on toe cut yarn a leaving end slipped stitch along side of heel sm knit instep long enough to weave in using yarn b knit stitches sm pick up and knit same number of remaining toe decreases as above use kitchener stitches along remaining side of heel knit to end of stitch to close toe round you may make copies for your own personal use you may not distribute this in any hardcopy or electronic format raspberry lemonade © 2006-2017 adrienne fong all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only http //bellybuttonknits blogspot com bellybuttonknits on ravelry page 2 charts note charts are read bottom to top right to left garter mosaic chart s p p p 8 yarn a knit s 7 6 p yarn a purl 5 p p s p 4 yarn b knit s 3 2 s slip yarn b 1 4 3 2 1 note the block to the right of the row number indicates the yarn in use brick mosaic chart 8 7 s 6 yarn a knit s 5 4 yarn b knit 3 s 2 s slip yarn b s 1 4 3 2 1 note the block to the right of the row number indicates the yarn in use raspberry lemonade © 2006-2017 adrienne fong all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only http //bellybuttonknits blogspot com bellybuttonknits on ravelry page 3 written instructions garter mosaic pattern for leg multiples of 4 row 1 & 2 with b k row 3 with a k1 sl 1 k2 row 4 with a p1 sl 1 wyib p2 row 5 & 6 with b k row 7 with a k3 sl 1 row 8 with a p3 sl 1 wyib row 9 with a k3 sl 1 row 10 with a p3 sl 1 wyib repeat row 1-10 for pattern brick mosaic pattern for foot multiples of 4 row 1 & 2 with a k1 sl 1 k2 row 3 & 4 with b k row 5 & 6 with a k3 sl 1 row 7 & 8 with b k repeat row 1-8 for pattern raspberry lemonade © 2006-2017 adrienne fong all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only http //bellybuttonknits blogspot com bellybuttonknits on ravelry page 4
